sect2.title: Show Menubar
sect2.para: The Show Menubar command enables and disables displaying the menubar. It may be useful to disable it if you are working in full-screen mode. If the menubar is not displayed, you can right-click on the image to access the menubar entries.
You can set the default for the menubar in the Image Window Appearance Preferences.

listitem.para:
You can access this command from the main menu through
View Show Menubar .
